predicate.note: Frames file for 'wade' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 51.3.2, Framenet entry Self-motion.

example.name: metaphorical?
example.text: Geoffrey Goodfellow, who dropped out of high school back in the 1970s to manage a computer network at a California research firm, says: ``Old network hands have started to turn off the network because they don't have time [*] to wade through the muck.''
